com.badlogic.gdx.ai.pfa

Interface SmoothableGraphPath<N,V extends com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector<V>>

  • Type Parameters:
    N - Type of node
    V - Type of vector, either 2D or 3D, implementing the Vector interface
    All Superinterfaces:
    GraphPath<N>, java.lang.Iterable<N>

    public interface SmoothableGraphPath<N,V extends com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector<V>>
extends GraphPath<N>
    A path that can be smoothed by a PathSmoother.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      V getNodePosition(int index)
      Returns the position of the node at the given index.
      void swapNodes(int index1, int index2)
      Swaps the specified nodes of this path.
      void truncatePath(int newLength)
      Reduces the size of this path to the specified length (number of nodes).

    • Method Detail

      • getNodePosition

        V getNodePosition(int index)
        Returns the position of the node at the given index.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the node you want to know the position

      • swapNodes

        void swapNodes(int index1,
               int index2)
        Swaps the specified nodes of this path.
        Parameters:
        index1 - index of the first node to swap
        index2 - index of the second node to swap

      • truncatePath

        void truncatePath(int newLength)
        Reduces the size of this path to the specified length (number of nodes). If the path is already smaller than the specified length, no action is taken.
        Parameters:
        newLength - the new length
